details.text: The extension http://hl7.org/fhir/test/StructureDefinition/ext-ctxt-defn is not allowed to be used at this point (allowed = e:Patient, e:Patient.name, x:http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/patient-interpreterRequired, p:Patient.address.where(use = 'home'); this element is [Address, Patient.address])
